analyzed: mañju vajra stotram
mañju garbha kṛtam
namaḥ śrī mañju vajrāya
śaśadharam iva śubhram khaḍga pustāka pāṇim
su rucira maliśa antam pañca cīram kumāram
pṛthutara vara mokṣam padma patra āyata akṣam
kumati dahana dakṣam mañjughoṣam namāmi
kṛta mṛga ripu yānam datta bhakta pradānam
sura danu ja nṛyānam bodhisattva pradhānam
kara sarasija bāṇam mañjughoṣam namāmi
vibhṛta sakala koṣam kṣālita ajñāna doṣam
smaraṇa bhajana toṣam dūra rāga ādi doṣam
vihita sa sura poṣam siddhi da ākhyāna yoṣam
kṛta jaḍa pariśoṣam mañjughoṣam namāmi
parivṛtam iva candra ābha ābham indīvara akṣam
asi śara japa mālā pustakam saṃvahantam
urasi lalita mālam mañjughoṣam namāmi  /
surapati śamanāya api eṣa mitra agni rakṣaḥ
pavana pramatha pālaiḥ saṃvṛtam smera vaktram
khaga pati ratha gātram brahma vandyam ramā umā
vihita caraṇa bhaktam mañjughoṣam namāmi
yad asi kaṭhina dhārā āccheda mārga abhivāhāḥ haḥ
bahu paricaya sthalyām bhūmi nadyā api reje
bahutara mahimānam mañjughoṣam namāmi
bhavat abhinava nutyā toṣitā guhya devī
nikhila nigama sārā su prakāśā atireje
bhava jalanidhi pāram dāna kalpadruma agram
galita bahu mahā ugram mañjughoṣam namāmi  /
vibhajati jana lokaḥ dharmadhātum maheśam
daśa śata dala padme saṃsthitam jyotiḥ aiśam
tat api tava praśastam deva māhātmyam īśam
vibhajati bhujaga īśam mañjughoṣam namāmi  /
paṭhati yat idam iṣṭam mālinī padya bandham
sa bhavati kavi rājaḥ vādi siṃhāsana sthaḥ
mañjuvajra stotram samāptam
